content: Filter VC 5 HEPA US ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Accessories for dust and water management > Filters for vacuums and air cleaners- - - ### FEATURES:Features Vacuum cleaner filter with additional testing of filtration efficiency Filters that are suitable for wet applications are washable Applications Suitable for wet and dry applications Maintenance tips: the filter is best cleaned using the vacuum cleaners internal filter cleaning mechanism (manual or automatic). Block the hose with your hand to increase the cleaning effect. Do not attempt to clean the filter by hitting it or using pressurized air. These actions may damage the filter. Avoid bending the filter. After washing and wet use, let the filter dry out properly before using it in a dry application. We recommend a day of drying time. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Filters For use with: VC 5 Filter type: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Accessory type | Filters | For use with | VC 5 | Filter type | Wet and Dry | Filter efficiency | 99.97% filter efficiency ### ITEMS- 2296564 - Filter VC 5 HEPA US - Package Size 1 pc
